Lead Automation with n8n

Learn How It Works

How Lead Automation Works

1

Lead Arrives

A potential customer fills your contact form or lands on your website

2

Instant Capture

n8n captures the lead data in real-time without any delay

3

Qualification

Automated rules analyze and score the lead quality

4

CRM Entry

Lead is automatically added to your CRM system

5

Notifications

Your sales team gets instant alerts about hot leads

6

Nurturing

Automated email sequences start nurturing the lead
